decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to establish a quick and aggressive playstyle by utilizing low-cost spells and creatures to apply constant pressure on the opponent. The deck focuses on utilizing prowess abilities and burn spells to deal damage to the opponent's life total quickly and efficiently. By combining creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage with spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. The mana base is designed to support a balanced mix of red and blue spells for maximum effectiveness.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent with efficient creatures and burn spells. The deck includes cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage to pressure the opponent early, while also utilizing spells like Reckless Rage and Monstrous Rage to clear blockers and push through damage. The deck also includes efficient card draw and tempo spells to ensure a steady stream of threats and disruption. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to be aggressive and proactive in order to quickly close out the game.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and disruptive spells. By playing a fast-paced game and keeping the opponent on the back foot with cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Skyclave Apparition, the deck aims to establish a strong board presence while preventing the opponent from executing their game plan effectively. Cards like Collected Company and Enduring Innocence provide additional value and flexibility, allowing the deck to adapt to different situations and maintain pressure on the opponent.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deploy low-cost creatures with high power and evasion, such as Soul-Scar Mage, Monastery Swiftspear, and Emberheart Challenger, in order to deal fast damage to the opponent. The deck also features spells like Reckless Rage and Monstrous Rage to remove blockers and push through damage, as well as card draw and mana fixing to help maintain a steady stream of threats. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, forcing them to react defensively or risk falling behind in the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing powerful legendary creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. It includes a variety of low-cost legendary creatures and support cards to maintain pressure and gain advantage on the board. The deck also features mana acceleration with cards like Mox Amber and efficient land base to allow for explosive starts. With a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive effects, the deck aims to control the game tempo and win through overwhelming force before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using green devotion cards like Llanowar Elves and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx, allowing you to cast big threats like Polukranos Reborn and Cavalier of Thorns early in the game. Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner helps draw additional cards and provide ramp, while cards like Storm the Festival and Outcaster Trailblazer help maintain board presence and pressure your opponent. The deck focuses on aggressive plays and overwhelming your opponent with powerful green creatures.

The core strategy of this Esper Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan with a combination of removal spells like Fatal Push and Day of Judgment, hand disruption with Thoughtseize, and powerful planeswalkers like Elspeth, Storm Slayer. The deck also utilizes cards like The Wandering Emperor and Vanishing Verse to control the board and maintain card advantage. The inclusion of Kaheera, the Orphanguard as a companion adds additional synergy and flexibility to the deck. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through resource management and efficient threat removal.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and fast burn spells to deal damage quickly and efficiently. Utilizing cards like Soul-Scar Mage and Monastery Swiftspear alongside spells like Reckless Rage and Monstrous Rage, the goal is to maintain a steady stream of pressure while controlling the board with effects like Boomerang Basics and Academic Dispute. The deck aims to close out the game as swiftly as possible through a combination of creature beatdown and spell-based damage.

The key concept of this UR Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast-paced, aggressive creatures and spells while also utilizing cards like Academic Dispute and Boomerang Basics to disrupt their strategy. The deck focuses on dealing direct damage to the opponent quickly, with cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage, while also utilizing cards like Den of the Bugbear and Experimental Synthesizer for additional threats. The inclusion of cards like Stock Up and Reckless Rage provide further versatility in dealing with various threats, making it a formidable deck in a Pioneer 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with spells to bring back Arclight Phoenix for repeated damage. It includes cheap instant and sorcery spells to trigger the Phoenix's ability, along with card draw and selection to help find the necessary cards. The deck also contains some disruptive elements like Lightning Axe and Picklock Prankster to control the board and protect the Phoenix. The mana base is optimized for consistency and flexibility, with a mix of lands to support the deck's aggressive strategy.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying efficient creatures while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Archon of Emeria. Collected Company helps to flood the board with creatures, creating a fast and aggressive game plan. The inclusion of Skyclave Apparition provides removal and tempo advantage, while cards like Aven Interrupter and Ouroboroid offer additional disruption and versatility. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of threats and maintain pressure throughout the game.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive plays and fast damage output. It utilizes powerful creatures like Preacher of the Schism and Bloodtithe Harvester, supported by removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat. The deck also includes disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. The mana base is designed for efficiency and consistency, allowing for quick deployment of threats. The key strategy is to apply pressure early and maintain control of the board to secure a quick victory.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient creatures like Archon of Emeria and Skyclave Apparition, while disrupting opponents with Thalia, Guardian of Thraben. Collected Company helps dig for additional threats, while cards like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic provide ramp. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with aggressive creatures and tempo plays, using cards like Aven Interrupter to further disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck thrives on pressuring opponents early and maintaining a solid board presence.

This deck focuses on quick and aggressive plays with creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Gifted Aetherborn, as well as removal like Fatal Push and Abrade to control the board. The synergy between Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse allows for powerful plays to overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Duress helps to disrupt the opponent's strategy while Preacher of the Schism provides additional value. Overall, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan to secure victory.

The deck focuses on assembling the combo of Greasefang and Parhelion II to generate a powerful board state and overwhelm the opponent. It includes support cards like Thoughtseize, Fatal Push, and Seasoned Hallowblade to control the board and protect the combo pieces. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and ensure consistent casting of spells. Additionally, the inclusion of Monument to Endurance and Guardian of New Benalia helps to further enhance the synergy and effectiveness of the combo strategy.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive plays to overwhelm the opponent. Utilizing efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat, combined with disruption from Duress and Thoughtseize, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while developing its own board presence. Bloodtithe Harvester and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse provide strong threats that demand immediate answers from the opponent. Mutavault and Blightstep Pathway allow for versatile mana options, while Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Hidetsugu Consumes All provide alternate win conditions. This deck aims to win through early pressure and disruption.
